title: Which eamcet college is best? - Quora
tags: Engineering Agricultural and Medical Common Entrance Test (EAMCET)

response.answer_text: Any good and reputed AUTONOMOUS college will be good. PS - DO NOT JOIN JNTU AFFILIATED COLLEGE . When I was seeking admission no one suggested me this. Everyone know the bitter truth behind JNTU but no one told me. infact all the students who have studied under JNTU AFFILIATED college suffered from this trauma and I don't want the upcoming batches to get into this crap. Joining in it may affect your academics and mental health very badly. They make you convince that you're a below average student by giving just pass marks even for a bright student. trust me JNTU never fails to surprise students with the marks.
